name: Dead Invaders: Modern War 3D
overview: Become the last line of defense and save humankind from extinction! Grab your guns and grenades and fight to the last alien! - Fight through the city and kill epic enemies - Live through dramatic battles against space invaders - Stunning Boss fights - New Stage 10 and Survival modes - Save your ammo, and don't get attacked - Kill thousands of opponents and save the Earth - Stand on the front line of war and test your determination
